channel.title: Build trusted, decentralized application with ease on PTT.ai-core - adaptive framework for decentralized application
channel.description: Recent content in Build trusted, decentralized application with ease on PTT.ai-core - adaptive framework for decentralized application

item.title: Install
item.description: To start developing with PTT.ai-core, you need to have Go installed. Currently, only the latest stable version is tested. Check Go Version You can check your installed go version with the following command: $ go version go version go1.12.4 darwin/amd64 Install PTT.ai-core We recommend go module as your dependency mangagement tool. You can start developing with PTT.ai-core without any setup with go module.

item.title: Example
item.description: Here’s a basic example of running a single node. You can check out the full source here. Run the example Build the example from source: git clone git@github.com:ailabstw/go-pttai-core.git cd examples/basic go build . Run the example: ./basic ./tmp 14779 The command above will start a node at port 14779 and save its data at ./tmp. Interact with node Now we have a node running. How can we interact with it?
